commands.name: screenshot
commands.title: Take Screenshot
commands.description: 快速截取屏幕并悬浮显示

scripts.prebuild: test -f float-window && test -f get_mouse_position || (test -f build-native.sh && ./build-native.sh || echo '请运行 ./build-native.sh 编译 float-window 和 get_mouse_position')
scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.json --outDir dist && cp float-window dist/ && cp get_mouse_position dist/
scripts.postbuild: if [ -d dist ] && [ -d ~/.config/raycast/extensions/screenshots-plugin ]; then cp -r dist/* ~/.config/raycast/extensions/screenshots-plugin/; fi
